statements: SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT payer_name, payee_name, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE payer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT payer_name, payee_name, transaction_amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT DISTINCT payer_name, payee_name FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payer_name, payee_name
SELECT COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_transactions
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND log_timestamp < '2022-01-31';
SELECT transaction_id, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, status FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'SUCCESS' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT pt.*, tl.message FROM payment_transactions pt INNER JOIN transaction_logs tl ON pt.transaction_id = tl.transaction_id WHERE tl.log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY tl.log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers FROM payment_transactions WHERE status = 'PENDING';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, payment_method FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE created_at < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, u.username FROM payment_transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY t.amount DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.payment_method, l.operation FROM payment_transactions t LEFT JOIN transaction_logs l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id WHERE l.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.payment_method ASC, l.operation DESC;
SELECT u.full_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u LEFT JOIN payment_transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.full_name HAVING total_transactions >= 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions JOIN logs ON transactions.transaction_id = logs.transaction_id WHERE logs.user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN users ON transactions.transaction_id = users.user_id JOIN products ON transactions.transaction_id = products.product_id ORDER BY transactions.transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT method_name, created_at FROM payment_methods ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT status_name FROM payment_status WHERE status_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT p.transaction_id, p.amount, u.username FROM payment_transactions p INNER JOIN users u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE p.amount > 500 AND u.username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT pm.method_name, COUNT(pt.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM payment_methods pm LEFT JOIN payment_transactions pt ON pm.payment_method_id = pt.transaction_id GROUP BY pm.method_name;
SELECT pl.log_id, pl.log_message, t.transaction_date FROM transaction_log pl INNER JOIN payment_transactions t ON pl.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE pl.log_timestamp > '2021-01-01';
